Financore 2024 Leak.description: A major financial services provider, Financore, suffered a database breach exposing customer PII and credit card numbers.

PayBuddy User Dump.description: A popular online payment platform, PayBuddy, had a user database containing transaction histories and linked bank account IDs leaked on a dark web forum.

CryptoTrade Wallet Breach.description: An unsecured API endpoint in the CryptoTrade platform exposed user account IDs and associated UPI IDs.
